alert.note: Alert for Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:16AM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Scotts Bluff and west central Morrill Counties through 1245 AM MDT... At 1216 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moomaws Corner, or 16 miles east of Scottsbluff, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bayard and Moomaws Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
